name: Not so Dangerous Maze
description:
Game done for GB30 Jam.

You are a cute insect lost in a maze. Kill all spider, avoid all mothes and escape through the door!

You can pick up friends to destroy some walls and kill ennemies.

Control :

Arrow  - Move

R - Restart current level

C - Display Credits screen

D - Start from the beginning

When on Credit screen you can only start from the beginning

Game done with Construct 3 free trial
